events.name: Exit
events.note: <Spawn on Player>

parameters: Would you like to return to level 4?
Insert a "Transfer Player" event command here
on where you want to go.
Named Map: Create & Go / Load (Arrival Point)

events.name: Goal
events.note: <Spawn Region: 1> <Not Cell with Event: Exit>

parameters: Would you like to go to level 6?
Adjust any settings you may deem fit here.
